CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 30, 1946, pg. 16 reads: "Boy Makes Tiny Model Furniture - A tube of glue, some scraps of wood, a sharp razor blade and a head full of ingenious schemes have made young Billy Taliaferro the pride and joy of his neighborhood...Billy fashions miniature furniture, worthy of a high-powered sales campaign..."
TitMainTitle: Billy Taliaferro and his sister Betty, posed with model airplanes and miniature furniture in their North Side home on Hazelton Street
